Name: Final Attack
Desc:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage. Must have a One-handed Sword equipped.
Required Skill: Sword Mastery Lv. 3 or above
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job Skill, 'Advanced Final Attack'

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] 40% chance to activate Final Attack that deals 50% damage 3 times.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks create a 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 50% Damage 3 times.

h1.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] 40% chance to activate Final Attack that deals 50% damage 3 times.
h1.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks create a 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 50% Damage 3 times.

HFields.h1: [Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks create a 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 50% Damage 3 times.
